element.label: ProcedureItem
element.definition: A clinical activity carried out for screening, investigative, diagnostic, curative, therapeutic, evaluative or palliative purposes.

element.label: ProcedureName
element.definition: Identification of the procedure by name.

element.label: Bodysite
element.definition: Identification of a simple body site for the location of the procedure.

element.label: Laterality
element.definition: The side of the body for the procedure.

element.label: DatePerformed
element.definition: The data when the procedure was performed.

element.label: CommentProcedure
element.definition: Additional narrative about the adverse reaction risk not captured in other fields.

element.label: ProcedureExclusionItemR1
element.definition: A positive statement about no known past procedures or operations, accurate only at the time of recording.

element.label: ProcedureExclusionStatement
element.definition: Positive statement that there are no known past procedures for inclusion.

element.label: ProcedureAbsenceItemR1
element.definition: A positive statement of absence of information about known past procedures or operations, accurate only at the time of recording.

element.label: ProcedureAbsenceStatement
element.definition: Positive statement that no information is available about past procedures or operations.
